law.full_text:
SPECIAL TAX. (Added by Ord. No. 168,368, Eff. 12/4/92.)
(a) There is hereby imposed a special tax on each parcel, improvement to property, and the use of property within the City of Los Angeles (hereafter “City”) for the purposes set forth in this article. The special tax shall be for a period not greater than 20 fiscal years, commencing with the fiscal year 1993-94 as set forth in Section 21.16.6 hereof.
(b) This tax is enacted under the authority of Section 101 of the Los Angeles City Charter, other authority held as a charter city, and, independently thereof, under the authority of California Government Code Sections 50075-50077.5 and California Government Code Sections 53970-53979. (Amended by Ord. No. 173,304, Eff. 6/30/00, Oper. 7/1/00.)
law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
SPECIAL TAX. (§ 21.16.3)
SPECIAL TAX. (Added by Ord. No. 168,368, Eff. 12/4/92.) (a) There is hereby imposed a special tax on each parcel, improvement to property, and the use of property within the City of Los Angeles (hereafter “City”) for the purposes set forth in this article. The special tax shall be for a period not greater than 20 fiscal years, commencing with the fiscal year 1993-94 as set forth in Section 21.16.6 hereof. (b) This tax is enacted under the authority of Section 101 of the Los Angeles City Charter, other authority held as a charter city, and, independently thereof, under the authority of California Government Code Sections 50075-50077.5 and California Government Code Sections 53970-53979. (Amended by Ord. No. 173,304, Eff. 6/30/00, Oper. 7/1/00.)
law.html:
SPECIAL TAX. (Added by Ord. No. 168,368, Eff. 12/4/92.)

(a) There is hereby imposed a special tax on each parcel, improvement to property, and the use of property within the City of Los Angeles (hereafter “City”) for the purposes set forth in this article.  The special tax shall be for a period not greater than 20 fiscal years, commencing with the fiscal year 1993-94 as set forth in Section 21.16.6 hereof.

(b) This tax is enacted under the authority of Section 101 of the Los Angeles City Charter, other authority held as a charter city, and, independently thereof, under the authority of California Government Code Sections 50075-50077.5 and California Government Code Sections 53970-53979. (Amended by Ord. No. 173,304, Eff. 6/30/00, Oper. 7/1/00.)
